title: Agecroft's Steinbrugge on Outlook for Hedge Fund Fees (Audio)

description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Donald A. Steinbrugge, Managing Partner of Agecroft Partners, LLC, on the outlook for hedge fund fees.
